languages.text: "Это мои-то?... Ха!" {n}Идира шмыгает носом и криво улыбается.{/n} "Чувства юмора вам не занимать, конечно..."
"Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Don't let anybody say the Lord Captain's got no sense of humour..."
languages.original_text: "Это мои-то?... Ха!" {n}Идира шмыгает носом и криво улыбается.{/n} "Чувства юмора вам не занимать, конечно..."

traits.locale_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "You're a laugh..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "You're a laugh..."

traits.locale_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Don't let anybody say the Lord Captain's got no sense of humour..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「まるで私がそういうのを持ってるみたい…ハッ！」{n}イディラは鼻をすすりながら、歪んだ笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンにもユーモアのセンスがあったなんてね…」
languages.original_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Don't let anybody say the Lord Captain's got no sense of humour..."

traits.locale_text: 「まるで私がそういうのを持ってるみたい…ハッ！」{n}イディラは鼻をすすりながら、歪んだ笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンにもユーモアのセンスがあったなんてね…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “说得就好像我真有那些东西一样……哈！”{n}伊迪拉抽了抽鼻子，对你露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}“要是有人说舰长大人缺乏幽默感，那我可不同意……”
languages.original_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Don't let anybody say the Lord Captain's got no sense of humour..."

traits.locale_text: “说得就好像我有那些东西一样……哈！”{n}伊迪拉抽了抽鼻子，对你露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}“你可真会开玩笑……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Como si yo tuviera algo de eso... ¡Ja!». {n}Idira resopla y te dedica una media sonrisa.{/n} «Que nadie diga que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no tiene sentido del humor...».
languages.original_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Don't let anybody say the Lord Captain's got no sense of humour..."

traits.locale_text: «Como si yo tuviera algo de eso... ¡Ja!». {n}Idira resopla y te dedica una media sonrisa.{/n} «Es muy gracios{mf|o|a}...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Als hätte ich das ... Ha!" {n}Idira schnieft und lächelt dich schief an.{/n} "Da soll noch jemand sagen, der Lord Captain hätte keinen Sinn für Humor ..."
languages.original_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Don't let anybody say the Lord Captain's got no sense of humour..."

traits.locale_text: "Als hätte ich das ... Ha!" {n}Idira schnieft und lächelt dich schief an.{/n} "Ihr seid ja wirklich lustig ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Comme si j'avais ne serait-ce qu'un semblant de volonté ou de moralité... Ha ! {n}renifle Idira avec un sourire en coin.{/n} Notre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} a toujours le mot pour rire... »
languages.original_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Don't let anybody say the Lord Captain's got no sense of humour..."

traits.locale_text: « Comme si j'avais ne serait-ce qu'un semblant de volonté ou de moralité... Ha ! {n}renifle Idira avec un sourire en coin.{/n} Notre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} a toujours le mot pour rire... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Onlar bende ne arar... Güleyim bari!" {n}İdira, burun çekip zoraki gülümsüyor.{/n} "Kim demiş Lord Kaptan mizahtan anlamaz diye?"
languages.original_text: "Like I have any of that... Ha!" {n}Idira sniffles and gives you a crooked smile.{/n} "Don't let anybody say the Lord Captain's got no sense of humour..."
